segments.text: In the kitchen, a woman stands by the sink area, holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin to capacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows and forms a pool on the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She appears focused solely on drying the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy positions himself on a step stool before the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He extends his arm into the open cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans slightly, indicating instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands close by, her hand raised toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink reveals a view of the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the walkway, leading to a fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter to the right of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the divided panes of the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lower cabinets show pulls on their doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel wraps around the plate she's handling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene depicts a typical household activity in progress.
segments.speaker: PAR
